name: Tomorrow's World
description:
Tomorrow's World

The world you knew is dead, your girl Olive is missing… humans are slaves... extreme weather is the norm… Evolution has continued... Traversing through a world to find your girl who has been taken by a species we thought as inferior barrel loving banana eaters.

Reach your girl Olive to go to the next level!

Controls:

MoveWASDJumpSpaceUse HammerFDrop HammerG
